channel.title: Unlisteds on Wintervale, ME
channel.description: Recent content in Unlisteds on Wintervale, ME

item.title: Hello again, internet.
item.description: Oh great, it’s time for Ren’s yearly blog post to annoy the hell out of everyone, eh?

item.title: New Topics: Shut Up and Listen
item.description: Or: How you need to learn to stop talking and try new things. No, seriously. You think you are open minded? How much?

item.title: A reflection on "TERF".
item.description: The more I’ve been pushing myself to be more independent, and to just grow in a positive direction, the more I realize that so many people just aren’t worth listening to.

item.title: A terrible absence.
item.description: I haven’t posted anything in a while. Again.

item.title: Obligatory diary.
item.description: I haven’t posted anything in a while.

item.title: Hello, Navi.
item.description: This was going to be a placeholder with nothing but a Serial Experiments Lain reference, but that’d be ridiculous.
